LanguageData.WNA_BC_ClonedSoildier.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in a clone vat as a clone soildier designed for battlefield and after-war rebuild. As a fruit of a high-quality clone soildier project, [PAWN_pronoun] has many pre-programmed knowledge and skills in [PAWN_possessive] head.
LanguageData.WNA_BC_ClonedSoildier.title: cloned soildier
LanguageData.WNA_BC_DeadChild.description: No matter it's because war, famine, sickness or just irresponsible parents, [PAWN_nameDef] was dead. Luckily Whelingnorther Alliance found [PAWN_objective], brought [PAWN_objective] back and revived [PAWN_objective].
LanguageData.WNA_BC_DeadChild.title: dead child
LanguageData.WNA_BC_MidworldCivilian.description: [PAWN_nameDef] lived a normal child life, had a normal family, entered a normal school, had normal friends, experienced no defficiency, and is positive about [PAWN_possessive] brilliant future.
LanguageData.WNA_BC_MidworldCivilian.title: midworld civilian
LanguageData.WNA_BC_MidworldRevenger.description: [PAWN_nameDef] used to have a happy family, until external forced torn [PAWN_possessive] family apart. Since then [PAWN_nameDef] became a strange person. [PAWN_pronoun] know who [PAWN_possessive] enemy is, but curretnly [PAWN_pronoun] just unable to revenge.
LanguageData.WNA_BC_MidworldRevenger.title: midworld revenger
LanguageData.WNA_BC_PeasantChild.description: [PAWN_nameDef] had grown up in the fields, had to help [PAWN_possessive] family with farm work since a young age.
LanguageData.WNA_BC_PeasantChild.title: peasant child
LanguageData.WNA_BC_Student.description: [PAWN_nameDef] entered school when [PAWN_pronoun] was around 6. The most valuable knowledge [PAWN_pronoun] learned from school is how to learn.
LanguageData.WNA_BC_Student.title: student
LanguageData.WNA_BC_Synthetic.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a fruit of a synthetic human project, printed from raw non-organic material and brought to life in a factory. This past seems resulting some problems in [PAWN_possessive] head, as [PAWN_pronoun] is always having trouble understanding artworks.
LanguageData.WNA_BC_Synthetic.title: synthetic humanlike
LanguageData.WNA_BC_ThirdGenChild.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s parents were residents under the shelter of Whelingnorther Alliance, [PAWN_nameDef] is also a resident under the shelter of Whelingnorther Alliance. Thanks to the protection ofWhelingnorther Alliance, nothing tragic happened to [PAWN_nameDef] during [PAWN_possessive] growth, but sadly there's also nothing memorable happened to [PAWN_objective] too.
LanguageData.WNA_BC_ThirdGenChild.title: third generation child
LanguageData.WNA_BC_UpliftedAnimal.description: [PAWN_nameDef] used to be an animal before [PAWN_pronoun] was reshaped to [PAWN_possessive] current form. [PAWN_nameDef] still keeps some memories and skills from [PAWN_possessive] animal ages, though some of them are no longer useful for [PAWN_possessive] current form.
LanguageData.WNA_BC_UpliftedAnimal.title: uplifted Animal
LanguageData.WNA_BC_UpliftedEntity.description: [PAWN_nameDef] used to be a twisted creature created by some dark source, and was reshaped to [PAWN_possessive] current form. Though the twisted past hardly left something useful for [PAWN_nameDef], [PAWN_pronoun] still managed to found something from that past.
LanguageData.WNA_BC_UpliftedEntity.title: uplifted entity
LanguageData.WNA_BC_UpliftedMech.description: [PAWN_nameDef] used to be a mechanoid controlled by a mechhive or some controller else, and was reshaped to [PAWN_possessive] current form. [PAWN_nameDef] still keeps some beneficial skills from [PAWN_possessive] past as a toaster.
LanguageData.WNA_BC_UpliftedMech.title: uplifted mechanoid
LanguageData.WNA_BC_UpliftedPlant.description: [PAWN_nameDef] used to be a plant, living a normal plant life until was reshaped to [PAWN_possessive] current form. It's hard to tell whether this past left something good or bad for [PAWN_nameDef].
LanguageData.WNA_BC_UpliftedPlant.title: uplifted plant
